mlutils.model.lstm package¶

Submodules¶

mlutils.model.lstm.ar_block_lstm module¶

class mlutils.model.lstm.ar_block_lstm.ArBlockLSTM(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: tensorflow.python.keras.engine.training.Model

call(inputs, training=False, mask=None)¶

Calls the model on new inputs.

In this case call just reapplies all ops in the graph to the new inputs (e.g. build a new computational graph from the provided inputs).

Arguments:

inputs: A tensor or list of tensors. training: Boolean or boolean scalar tensor, indicating whether to run

the Network in training mode or inference mode.

mask: A mask or list of masks. A mask can be

either a tensor or None (no mask).

Returns:

A tensor if there is a single output, or a list of tensors if there are more than one outputs.

forecast(inputs, num_steps, training)¶

call(inputs, training=None, mask=None)¶

Calls the model on new inputs.

In this case call just reapplies all ops in the graph to the new inputs (e.g. build a new computational graph from the provided inputs).

Arguments:

inputs: A tensor or list of tensors. training: Boolean or boolean scalar tensor, indicating whether to run

the Network in training mode or inference mode.

mask: A mask or list of masks. A mask can be

either a tensor or None (no mask).

Returns:

A tensor if there is a single output, or a list of tensors if there are more than one outputs.
